title: The Wyeth phenomenon
brief_description: In this film, critics and admirers discuss Mr. Wyeth’s style and subjects and try their hand at uncovering meanings in his art. Discussing the artist are the art critic of “The New York Times”, John Canady; artist Henriette Hurd (Wyeth’s sister); and Wyeth’s son, James.
